result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley, Atty Alex Andrea, NONA by def. Due to non-appearance State requests warrant. Court issues warrant.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan Kelly, DF ATTY: Alex Andrea, DF: Ryan Patrick Richardson did not appear.  Court called at 11:15 p.m.  Set for PTC.  DE does not appear.  Court authorizes a bench warrant - stayed until 02/12/16 at 1:00 p.m. Court adjourned.  lw  Return on warrant scheduled for February 12, 2016 at 01:05 pm.
State's. Filed by ADA Kelly. hml
Notice of Motion to Suppress Statements and Notice of Motion to Suppress Evidence. Filed by Atty Andrea. km

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Ryan Patrick Richardson appeared. Defendant to submits address. Bond continues in form and amount.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan Patrick Richardson
Current: 1423 Hazel Court Apt #1, Hudson, WI 54016 United States  (Effective: 12-10-2015)
Prior: Unknown, Unknown, WI 
per Defendant in court. eif

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Amy Richardson or her reside.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Phone contact with A.I.R. only.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Ryan Patrick Richardson appeared from jail.  Defendant was to provide an address to where he would be staying but the jail would not allow him to look at his phone. Atty Andrea is requesting Defendant to be released and notify the Court within 24 hours with an address.  Review hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Amy R. or her residence.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Phone contact only with A.I.R. dob 5/27/1999.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: EJL, RPR: Staci Lundmark, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Ryan Patrick Richardson appeared from jail.  Defendant does qualify for PD. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. Defendant to notify the Court within 48 hours of address.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
